website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive closet organizer offers plenty of space for customers needing to store shoes or other small belongings.
pros: Offered in either white or gray
Two metal hooks connect organizer to closet bar or rack
Customers appreciate sleek and tidy design
cons: Shelves are smaller in width than many customers anticipated

customer_reviews.title: Glove (shoe) don't fit...must return it.
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of time and money. Barely fits one single men's size 11 shoe per compartment. Maybe this company should consider putting accurate descriptions on their products with useful tidbits like measurements for the compartments rather than touting their supposedly glorious history while fronting cheaply made Chinese products. Don't waste your time. Look elsewhere for your closet needs unless you have baby sized feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rack with intentions to put it in my closet for only shoes. It could be used for extra storage; meanwhile, the spaces a quite small. There are is a thin piece of material that divides each space. I figured it would be a cardboard type of divider but it isn't. If you have SMALL shoes (I wear a women's 5/6) your shoes would fit fine. Any bigger shoes, you would have to put ONE shoe in each space. The color of this product is great and the hangers are great. Just more on the thin, smaller side. I do like this product, BUT it is thinner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Green

customer_reviews.title: Item doesn’t even function properly it is so cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very inexpensive but extremely cheap. I found something similar for the same amount of money but higher quality in my local T.J.Maxx. Item will rip if more than one small piece of clothing is placed in it. Cheap metal and microfiber cloth no cardboard or anything to reinforce shelves. Not worth purchasing at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe rack I actually used it to organize a slim locker
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy it seems to be. The material is kind of like tarp material, so it won't rip easily. For some people it might be a little too narrow, but for my needs it was perfect. I wear a woman's size 7, and you can see the shoes I was able to fit on there. I liked it so much, I bought the bigger size for some clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's the big deal?
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazon's Choice product, which I highly respect Amazon's choices but I don't see what is so good about this product. It doesn't even have cardboard on the bottom of each shelf like other competing products. I guess I'll have to make my own cardboard bottoms for it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer Dude

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits ladies shoes just fine. I'm storing flats, heels, tennishoes and flip-flops. The fabric is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Black

customer_reviews.title: Slots are smaller than the picture would have you believe
customer_reviews.text: These likely work really well for children's or women's shoes, or for flat dress shoes. But, most men's shoes do not fit well as a pair in one of these slots. I need one of these that's about 15 to 25% bigger, unfortunately...instead, I use each slot for one shoe and hang half as many pairs. Other than that, it's a fine product and an economical use of space. All things considered, if you've got the closet space and a sizeable collection of men's shoes, it might be worth buying two, hanging them next to one another, and putting one shoe of the pair in each.
customer_reviews.author: Yondaime-dono

customer_reviews.title: Step above cheap organizers from college
customer_reviews.text: We needed a nice way to maximize space in our very small condo, and this is perfect. Can store multiple flip flops in one slot, bigger sneakers, high heels, and ankle boots. They look better than the cheap cloth organizers and won't get dingy with the plastic-like material. Easy to set up and good way to organize multiple shoes without a bulky stand.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color, and it is holding up very well even while being completely stocked with shoes
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Convenient space saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people who have limited closet space. Easy to put together. Would definitely Recommend this purchase to people who have small apartments/houses. Because that usually means limited closet space.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Podratz

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: First, the cubes don't seem as big as they look in the pictures, but maybe those shoes are small. That said I have size 13 (men's) shoes that fit in just fine albiet a bit snug on some of them. I do have to put them sideways, with the bottoms fasibg to left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something very small for my very small closet and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: For small shoes. Not for large men’s shoes
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough I guess. Not for men’s shoes. Kids shoes fit okay in there. Bought 4 and one was ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Rough Balance
customer_reviews.text: Rough balance, but good overall. Sort of flimsy and cheap, but it is cheap. So, not bad to be honest
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material, the slots a very small and a hard time squeezing in any shoe bigger than a pair of Converse. If you buy enough to put one shoe in each slot if you have tennis shoes, you’ll be doing OK. Definitely not big enough to fit boots.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: it also holds shoes okay (we put a couple pair in the bottom box) and clothes nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for extra storage/organization in my daughter's closet. Works as expected, it also holds shoes okay (we put a couple pair in the bottom box) and clothes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Nehman

customer_reviews.title: Fit different types of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of shoes, fit different types of shoes. Love it, great way to organize them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy is practical.
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for what we needed: It will provide space for small handbags and shoes also.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart within 1st week
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointed as the threads from one of the shelves started to unravel within the first week :(
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: This item really help increase my closet space and top shelf. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of having it in the hall closet to put our shoes away when we come home.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wen

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be deeper
customer_reviews.text: Wish these were just a bit deeper. My size 9 shoes don’t fit all the way in
customer_reviews.author: Orpheus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good for smaller shoes like flip flops and heels. The shelves are too small for boots.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for kids shoes. I loved the one I bought so much that I purchased a second one
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What My Closet Needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit & finishing piece in my closet. Nicely hangs all my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my many many MANY pairs of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just as it appears in the photo. Perfect for my many many MANY pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Hang Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love that it hangs on my clothes rod vs over the door, 10 pairs of shoes (or more if 2 pairs flip flops put in one hole) in minimal space!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for now but relatively cheap design compared to what I have seen even at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 fit perfectly in the space I needed to use for this!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Cunninghanm

customer_reviews.title: Allow enough head room in each slot for taller shoes, yes, making less slots.
customer_reviews.text: The sections could be taller. Obviously, there would be less slots. I have shoes that are plenty narrow enough but too tall to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tantric Adept

customer_reviews.title: Evaporated water in a can
customer_reviews.text: Good. Been using it for awhile but I just now got to making a review👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my tiny closet these worked great! Good construction and wuality!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Good quality material and I like how narrow they are for the space I was working with. Depending on the shoe, you may not be able to fit both in one slot but I don’t mind that
customer_reviews.author: sarah hutson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Will order more
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack fits neatly in my closet and has space large enough for my bigger styles. Very satisfied. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: No issues, and size was perfect. Quality seems good its holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love my new shoe caddy!!! Holds 10 pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, takes up little room and holds lots of leggins
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are very useful and compact. They fit nicely into a small closet.
customer_reviews.author: Mathmom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I got one for all in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool man
customer_reviews.text: This is really good it just doesn’t hold big shoes like boots
customer_reviews.author: emersonsorto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have three. They take up very little space and hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it
customer_reviews.text: You can only fit one shoe in it in the slots
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It works good for its price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty darn good I hanged it in my closet and it works fairly for its price
customer_reviews.author: MelissaVillatoro

customer_reviews.title: Way to SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I can barley fit one shoe in slot. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for kids ... not so much for adults
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a few of these to put in an unused closet and figured it would be perfect. Well, unfortunately the opening doesn't allow for any type of heels or more than one shoe. It will work for things like flip flops, but there is no way any of my heels, boots or sneakers will work with the limited opening. Figured rather than return, I'll repurpose them to hold odds and ends in the linen closet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle New

customer_reviews.title: It’s Okay
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. Item came with missing metal piece and a bit smaller than expected. However, I was able to store my flats and sandals like I wanted so I gave 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dkamiel

customer_reviews.title: Really like this as a storage option
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this. I usually keep shoes in their original boxes and this is great for storage for my flats, dress shoes, and work shoes. Really good product for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Letrice Gant

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son love's it I bought it for his dorm he is happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: C-
customer_reviews.text: had it for a month and the top part started ripping, i didnt have it overloaded, my GF had heels in it. and it wasnt even all the way full. cheap material and bad engineering where the top meets the hanger
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son's room closet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's closet. It's useful, and nice and doesn't take much space. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jemmie

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: very flimsy, with luck it will at least hold up until I can replace it with better quality. I know, what did I expect for $10.00
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier. Works perfectly for my flips flops and flats
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier. Works perfectly for my flips flops and flats. Didn’t hold my heals or sneakers which I had a feeling it wouldn’t. Doesn’t take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: TheLeopardStylist

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Slim design, easy to hang, got here quickly and in excellent condition Cons: A little flimsier than I thought Larger shoes cant fit with its mate, have to put it in a slot by itself. I ordered 2 of these so I had room to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy but decent got price and did the job intended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Salyers

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but works for kids or teenager
customer_reviews.text: The slots for the shoes are quite small. Glad I order this for my daughter who has small shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Hanging Shoe Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Shoe Shelve. It is sewed well. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Really made a difference in organizing my closet without spending a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was okay, the ones from Ikea are more durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful happiness
customer_reviews.text: Great to make more space and be out of the way at the same time. I'm very happy with this product. I've only had it a short while, so I hope that it is a durable one!
customer_reviews.author: bmpc2015

customer_reviews.title: I have my daughter plan her outfits while she is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have my daughter plan her outfits while she is looking at the whether channel so in the morning it doesn't take her forever to pick out her clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Neela Finlay

customer_reviews.title: no big shoes.
customer_reviews.text: works good for sandals. boots or regular shoes not so much. for kids shoes is great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great to organize all my son's shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my locker at the gym. It only fits one athletic type show per shelf, but it gets the job done. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cutino

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: After one month of using, the hooks broke, so I am not super impressed. I like its color and length, though the material is not strong and steady enough.
customer_reviews.author: Malootina

product_meta.title: Whitmor Hanging Shoe Shelves - Crosshatch Gray
product_meta.description: Size:10 Shelf| Color:GrayOrganize and protect your shoes with these space saving Hanging Shoe Shelves. These hanging shoe shelves are designed to accommodate up to 10 pairs of shoes. The see-through breathable sides keep shoes smelling fresh and choosing the right pair a snap. Hangs easily from a sturdy metal frame with the provided hooks on a standard closet rod. Can be used for more than shoes-great for kids clothes, accessories and more. Whitmor is a 4th generation family-owned and operated business. Since 1946, Whitmor has been dedicated to bringing organization home by creating products that simplify everyday life. Ensuring that those products are built with integrity, value, and innovation is our commitment to you. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%. Whitmor customer service is available in English and Spanish Monday through Friday from 8am - 4:30pm CST. Call us and we will gladly assist you in your language. You may contact Whitmor toll-free at 1-888-944-8667 or via email at help@whitmor.com.
feature_bullets: Provide shoe storage to free up floor space
Store organize and protect shoes and accessories by offering 10 storage spaces
Hanging shoe shelves offer storage & protection from dust & damage
Assembled Dimensions: 11.5 L x 5.5 W x 52 H inches
Easy assembly, installed with metal hooks that hang from the closet rod or garment rack
Made to last, with strong yet breathable fabric and reinforced seams
Large capacity with 10 easy-access shelves for quick visibility and storage
For over 70 years, Whitmor has been bringing organization home. If you have questions or problems, please contact us for immediate assistance
